channel.title: Elixir on kars7e's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on kars7e's Blog

item.title: My introduction to Elixir programming language
item.description: Today I’m going to talk a bit about Elixir, the programming language that I chose to write my project in. I will start by saying that this is not a comprehensive introduction, but just my take on what are the Elixir’s most interesting features, and why I think this language has a bright future ahead of it.

item.title: Daj Się poznać - challange accepted
item.description: To motivate myself a bit, I decided to take part in Maciej’s contest and, for a period of 10 weeks, work on an open source project.
